title: LTX-2 Video Generator
description: Generate high-quality AI videos with synchronized audio using Lightricks LTX-2 model. Supports text-to-video and image-to-video generation. Models are automatically downloaded from HuggingFace on first run.

presets.name: FP8 Distilled (Recommended)
presets.description: Fastest inference with FP8 quantization - best for RTX 4090. Models auto-download from HuggingFace.

presets.name: Full Precision Distilled
presets.description: Higher quality with full precision - requires 40GB+ VRAM

input.name: Enable FP8
input.description: Use FP8 quantization for lower VRAM usage (true/false)

input.name: HuggingFace Token
input.description: REQUIRED: HuggingFace token for Gemma model. Get token at huggingface.co/settings/tokens and accept Gemma license at huggingface.co/google/gemma-3-12b-it-qat-q4_0-unquantized
